attributes.background: Limit HGV driver to 12 or 13 hour maximum per day , drivers are expected to work 15 hours 3 times week and have 9 hours rest and 13 hours rest of the week and 11 hours rest resulting in tired over worked drivers

rejection.details:
There are already daily and weekly limits on the number of hours those driving goods vehicles can drive. These vary depending on the weight of a goods vehicles, but all are more strict than those you request in your petition.

You can find out more about these rules here: https://www.gov.uk/drivers-hours/goods-vehicles
